p: Folin–Ciocalteu reagent, 2,4-dinitrophenylhydrazine, 2-thiobarbituric acid, 5,5′-dithiobis- (2-nitrobenzoic) acid, bovine serum albumin (BSA), Coomassie Brilliant Blue G-250, gallic acid, guaiacol, L-ascorbic acid, L-glutathione reduced, L-methionine, L-proline, nitro blue tetrazolium, polyvinylpyrrolidone, riboflavin, trichloroacetic acid were purchased from Sigma (St. Louis, MO, USA). All other reagents and solvents were analytical grade from Vecton (Saint Petersburg, Russia).
